name: rental-property-calculator-mcp-node
description: Rental Property Calculator — calculate return on rental properties with long‑form, human‑readable analysis. Computes ROI on rental property, cash‑on‑cash return, IRR, cap rate, NOI, mortgage P&I, cash flow, equity, and a 20‑year investment summary for single‑family and multi‑family rentals. Accepts purchase, financing, rent, vacancy, taxes, insurance, HOA, maintenance, appreciation, and cost‑to‑sell assumptions to calculate multi‑family returns and single‑family ROI.
